text: Dick Cadwalader is a pioneering American gasser drag racer.Davis, Larry. Gasser Wars (Cartech, 2003), p.180. Driving an Oldsmobile-powered 1933 Ford, Cadwalader won NHRA's first ever A/G national title, at Great Bend, Kansas, in 1955. He recorded a speed of .Davis, p.180. (His elapsed time was not recorded or has not been preserved.) ==Notes== ==Sources== *Davis, Larry. Gasser Wars, North Branch, MN: Cartech, 2003, p.180. title: Dick Cadwalader
